name: American Outdoor Brands, Inc.
description: American Outdoor Brands, Inc. is a leading provider of outdoor products and accessories, primarily focused on the shooting sports and outdoor recreation markets. Established in 2016, the company has a rich heritage, stemming from its legacy brands, which have been in the industry for decades. AOUT offers a diverse portfolio that includes firearms, ammunition, and outdoor gear, catering to a wide range of outdoor enthusiasts, hunters, and competitive shooters. The company's mission is to provide innovative and high-quality products that enhance the outdoor experience while promoting responsible firearm ownership and safety. AOUT is committed to sustainability and actively participates in conservation efforts to protect the natural environment associated with outdoor activities. Through its various subsidiaries, the company markets well-known brands such as Smith & Wesson, Thompson/Center Arms, and others, making it a trusted name in the industry. American Outdoor Brands continues to innovate and expand its product offerings, focusing on meeting the evolving needs of its customers and fostering a community of outdoor enthusiasts.
